entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023
